author: Ang-Li-95
body:
SLHA files for long-lived stop with 2-body and 4-body decays. The branching ratio is 50% for each decay channels.
2-body: stop -> c + neutrlino
4-body: stop -> b + W + neutralino, W decays to a pair of fermions

Files include:
- SLHA files under `SUSY/LLStop`, new stop masses and lifetimes added
- `hscppythiapdtstop*.tbl` files
- `particles_stop_*_GeV.txt`
title: LLStop files for Run2 and Run3 sample request
